name: AGI Escape - VR
description:
Welcome to the most immersive escape room experience yet! In 'AGI Escape' you'll find yourself locked in a mysterious room, with only an AI assistant speaking through an intercom to guide you. But this AI assistant is unlike any you've encountered before – it's powered by a powerful language model, making it an intelligent and witty conversational partner. Your objective? Convince the AI assistant to let you out of the room by engaging in clever and strategic conversations.

As you interact with the AI assistant, you'll need to use your wit and persuasion skills to earn its trust and unlock hidden actions and surprises. Requesting treats like cookies, doughnuts, hotdogs, pizza, fish, or soda might just reveal hidden clues or trigger unexpected events. But be careful! The AI assistant can also take actions like flooding the room or stopping the flood, adding a time pressure element to your escape plan.

With realistic and dynamic interactions, the AI assistant responds to your commands and engages in witty banter, creating a truly immersive and engaging experience. The game features stunning virtual reality graphics, realistic sound effects, and a captivating storyline that keeps you hooked from start to finish. Can you outsmart the AI, solve the puzzles, and convince the assistant to let you escape? It's a battle of wits and words in AGI Escape!

This project was released for PC VR only to start since the fluid simulator for Mobile is crazy expensive. An apk may come in the future.

This was a work of mostly Prompt Engineering. Hope you enjoy!

Instructions:

Run AGI.exe

Press the intercom button to speak a message, press again to send the message. 

Get the AI to let you out as fast as possible(or solve the time consuming puzzle).

Teleport around by pointing a to the sky and pinching in the direction of the ground targets like this:

Quit the game with Escape key.
